detail.introduction: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'div.container > section > div > span:nth-child(2)');}
detail.upDate: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'body > div.container.mb-3 > section.mb-3.cc-f.p-2 > div.d-flex.mx-n1 > div:nth-child(2) > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(5)');}

tabs.list: function Main(html){return jsoups(html,'section:nth-child(4) > div > div >  div > ul.nav > li > a:nth-child(1)');}
tabs.name: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'a');}
